WorcF126.Transcription:
Blysse & Ioye & heryngBe to þe lord kyngBegger of
                    man kundeTo wan þe chyldren singgyngWeþ here palmes
                    beryngOf þy mylde comiggTo day makeþ munde
WorcF126.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 71.
